title: Portugal chooses between a moderate and a populist in runoff presidential election
content:
Here's a summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Portugal is holding a runoff presidential election.
*   Voters face a choice between a moderate and a populist candidate.
*   The election presents a decision between two contrasting political ideologies.

title: Thailand votes in early election with 3 main parties vying for power
content:
Here's a summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Thailand is currently holding an early general election.
*   Three main political parties are contesting the vote.
*   These parties are competing to gain power in the government.

title: Ready to make available 8,505 Group B officers for SIR: West Bengal to Election Commission
content:
Here's a summary of the headline in 3 bullet points:

*   West Bengal has offered to provide 8,505 Group B officers.
*   This offer is made to the Election Commission.
*   The officers are designated for "SIR" (likely election-related duties or supervision).

title: Government to constitute high-level panel on banking soon: Finance Minister
content:
Here's a summary in 3 bullet points:

*   The Finance Minister announced plans for a new high-level panel.
*   The government will constitute this panel to address issues in the banking sector.
*   Its formation is anticipated to happen soon.

title: NLC India signs MoU with Cuddalore district administration for infrastructure projects
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   NLC India has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Cuddalore district administration.
*   The agreement focuses on the development and implementation of various infrastructure projects.
*   This partnership aims to boost infrastructure development within the Cuddalore district.

title: Puducherry government issues advisory after avian influenza detection in Chennai crow samples
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   The Puducherry government has issued an advisory.
*   This action was taken due to the detection of avian influenza (bird flu).
*   The bird flu was found in crow samples from Chennai.

title: CM Stalin writes to PM Modi seeking timely release of funds for land acquisition for railway projects in Tamil Nadu
16th Finance Commission identifies T.N. as one of top three States suffering heavy losses of public sector enterprises
content:
Here's a summary of the headline in 3 bullet points:

*   The 16th Finance Commission has identified significant losses within public sector enterprises.
*   Tamil Nadu (T.N.) is ranked among the top three states suffering these heavy losses.
*   This highlights a major financial challenge for the state regarding the performance of its government-owned companies.

title: T.N. government would like to take Home Again programmes for mentally ill to all districts: Chief Secretary
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   The T.N. government plans to expand the "Home Again" program, which supports the mentally ill.
*   The initiative aims to make the program accessible in all districts across the state.
*   This expansion was announced by the Chief Secretary.
